text: Date of visit; 28 Oct 2024 @ 6.45pm. I encountered a receptionist or staff who, rather than greeting us politely, seemed disinterested and impatient. Her demeanour was abrupt, and she responded to my girlfriend's questions in a condescending manner. When my girlfriend sought clarification on certain matters, she was met with dismissive gestures and curt replies that left me feeling both unwelcome and disrespected. No eye contact nor proper address.
Worse bank in the world. Bad customer service, called the hotline and they donâ€™t even know how to help. RM not responsive as well and provide contradicting information.
Went here to close my bank account and it took me ~6 mins including waiting time (1.30pm on a Thursday). Impressive.
